name: Apple Cinnamon Sugar Treats
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, mix together the sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon.
Core the apple and cut into thin slices.
Dip the apple slices into the sugar mixture and place on a lightly greased baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
